entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to a few flurries near midnight and ending overnight then 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow level 2200 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
